bio: Hi! I am anonymouse. You will never know my name but my rival is "@anonycat" a.k.a Tom the Cat!

posts.title: AITA For being faster
posts.content: Tom the Cat is my rival. He is always trying to catch me but I always outsmart him.

posts.title: Fastest Mouse in the West!
posts.content: I outsmarted Tom the Cat again! I am the best mouse in the world!

posts.title: Yay! Cheese!
posts.content: Today I found a piece of cheese! It was the best day of my life!

posts.title: Mouse's Best Friend!
posts.content: Spike the Dog is my friend. He always helps me out when Tom the Cat is around.

posts.title: Cheese is the Best!
posts.content: Cheese is my favorite food! I love it so much!

posts.title: Stoopid Hooman!
posts.content: Tom's owner is always trying to catch me! I always outsmart him though!
